password.description: Password to use when authenticating to the source. This provider cannot perform drift detection of this configuration.

revision.description: For sources that are version-aware, the revision to use.

sshKey.description: SSH key to use when authenticating to the source. This provider cannot perform drift detection of this configuration.

type.description: The type of source to use. For example, "archive".

url.description: The URL where the app resource can be found.

username.description: Username to use when authenticating to the source.
